title: Task Management API
description: A RESTful API for task management with authentication, task CRUD operations, and team collaboration features.
details: This Task Management API provides a robust backend for task tracking applications. It features user authentication and authorization using JWT, complete CRUD operations for tasks and projects, team collaboration functionality, and role-based permissions. The API is built with Node.js and Express, with data stored in MongoDB. The codebase follows a modular architecture with comprehensive error handling and input validation.
